text: appeal addehattinre janatayile satyanisedhikalaya pramanimar parannu: ivan ninnaleppealeyulla oru manusyan matramakunnu. ninnalekkalupariyayi avan mahatvam netiyetukkan agrahikkunnu. allahu uddesiccirunnenkil avan (dutanmarayi) malakkukale tanne irakkumayirunnu. nannalute purvvapitakkalkkitayil innaneyeann nannal kettittilla
